entry.title: WIND WARNING , Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning except gusting to 50 near Haro Strait late this morning and this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except east 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
